acceptMigration(address,uint256).details: Stakes ORBS tokens on behalf of msg.sender. This method assumes that the user has already approved at least the required amount using ERC20 approve.

params._amount: uint256 The amount of tokens to stake.

addMigrationDestination(address).details: Adds a new contract to the list of approved staking contracts migration destinations.

params._newStakingContract: IMigratableStakingContract The new contract to add.

distributeRewards(uint256,address[],uint.details: Distributes staking rewards to a list of addresses by directly adding rewards to their stakes. This method assumes that the user has already approved at least the required amount using ERC20 approve. Since this is a convenience method, we aren't concerned about reaching block gas limit by using large lists. We assume that callers will be able to properly batch/paginate their requests.

params._amounts: uint256[] The amounts of the rewards.
params._stakeOwners: address[] The addresses of the stake owners.
params._totalAmount: uint256 The total amount of rewards to distributes.

getStakeBalanceOf(address).details: Returns the stake of the specified stake owner (excluding unstaked tokens).
getStakeBalanceOf(address).return: uint256 The stake of the stake owner.

getToken().details: Returns the address of the underlying staked token.
getToken().return: IERC20 The address of the token.

getTotalStakedTokens().details: Returns the total amount staked tokens (excluding unstaked tokens).
getTotalStakedTokens().return: uint256 The total staked tokens of all stake owners.

getUnstakeStatus(address).details: Returns the time that the cooldown period ends (or ended) and the amount of tokens to be released.
getUnstakeStatus(address).return: cooldownAmount uint256 The total tokens in cooldown.cooldownEndTime uint256 The time when the cooldown period ends (in seconds).

isApprovedStakingContract(address).details: Returns whether a specific staking contract was approved as a migration destination.

params._stakingContract: IMigratableStakingContract The staking contract to look for.

migrateStakedTokens(address,uint256).details: Migrates the stake of msg.sender from this staking contract to a new approved staking contract.

params._amount: uint256 The amount of tokens to migrate.
params._newStakingContract: IMigratableStakingContract The new staking contract which supports stake migration.

releaseAllStakes().details: Requests the contract to release all stakes.

removeMigrationDestination(address).details: Removes a contract from the list of approved staking contracts migration destinations.

restake().details: Restakes unstaked ORBS tokens (in or after cooldown) for msg.sender.

setEmergencyManager(address).details: Sets the address of the emergency manager.

params._newEmergencyManager: address The address of the new emergency manager.

setMigrationManager(address).details: Sets the address of the migration manager.

params._newMigrationManager: address The address of the new migration manager.

stake(uint256).details: Stakes ORBS tokens on behalf of msg.sender. This method assumes that the user has already approved at least the required amount using ERC20 approve.

params._amount: uint256 The amount of tokens to stake.

stopAcceptingNewStakes().details: Requests the contract to stop accepting new staking requests.

unstake(uint256).details: Unstakes ORBS tokens from msg.sender. If successful, this will start the cooldown period, after which msg.sender would be able to withdraw all of his tokens.

params._amount: uint256 The amount of tokens to unstake.

withdraw().details: Requests to withdraw all of staked ORBS tokens back to msg.sender. Stake owners can withdraw their ORBS tokens only after previously unstaking them and after the cooldown period has passed (unless the contract was requested to release all stakes).

withdrawReleasedStakes(address[]).details: Requests withdraw of released tokens of a list of addresses.

params._stakeOwners: address[] The addresses of the stake owners.
